definition: to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: Most privatelenders require student borrowers to have a cosigner.
sentences.chinese: 大部分私營借貸公司會要求學生拉上一個聯保人。

sentences.english: Second, decompose the control indicators and allot them to the basic joint liability unit.
sentences.chinese: 二要將可控指標層層分解落實到聯保基本單元。
